alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:59AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL ITASCA AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 AM CDT... At 959 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Chisholm, to near Hibbing, to Nashwauk, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chisholm around 1010 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Buhl, Virginia, Eveleth, Mountain Iron and Cherry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
